headline: Pentair’s Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: Pentair is expected to release its third-quarter results this month, with analysts forecasting a modest single-digit growth in earnings.

headline: Pentair (PNR): Does Its Strong Earnings Streak Signal More Upside for Valuation?
summary: Pentair (PNR) is in the spotlight after its shares climbed to a new 52-week high. This move is likely linked to the company’s consistent earnings outperformance and recent upgrades to future profit expectations. See our latest analysis for Pentair. Momentum is clearly building for Pentair, with its share price climbing to $111.8 and notching an 11.4% gain since the start of the year. Investors seem to be rewarding Pentair’s track record of positive earnings surprises and upward earnings...
